products.title: Honey Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Perfect Fit Honey Wood Venetian Blinds. Combine the luxury Sunwood collection of 25mm Wood Venetian with a state of the art perfect fit frame specifically designed for use with UPVC windows, bi-folds, conservatory and doors.
products.productdescription: A mid brown shade, the Honey Oak 25mm Perfect Fit blind boasts elegance in any window. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the Perfect Fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in Yorkshire, the Perfect Fit frame is made from Aluminium, with UV-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator. Inside the Perfect Fit frame the blind uses a colour co-ordinating light brown headrail and a tan bottom bar, with a clear operating handle and control wan

products.title: Mouse Honeycomb Dimout Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Mouse Honeycomb Dimout Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: Grey is a popular colour and that won’t change anytime soon. The Mouse Honeycomb Dimout Perfect Fit blind will enhance any room it’s in with it’s gentle grey colour. If you’re after a dimout Perfect Fit blind and grey is your colour, this blind is for you.  Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The blackout pleated fabric will gently filter the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more.

products.title: Infusion asc Beige Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Infusion ASC Beige Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4104. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which  improves energy efficiency
products.productdescription: Infusion asc Beige Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee!  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.

products.productdescription: Luna Blackout Taupe Beige Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Luna Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The "Luna Blackout" range has a   backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.
